name: Holiday Inn Express Camarillo

reviews.text: Excellent HIExpress property. I travel for business regularly and found this property to be one of the better ones. You won't be disappointed. Newly decorated (wallpaper, paint, carpets, common areas). Breakfast also has omlets in addition to regular HIE stuff.
reviews.title: Excellent
Flawless stay
reviews.text: We stayed at the Holiday Inn Express in Camarillo, California on June 22, 2005 for 3 nights. We had 4 rooms for all three nights. Hotel staff was extremely accommdating and courteous throughout the entire stay. Our rooms were clean and comfortable. They all had microwaves and small refrigerators which were convenient for our group. The free contiental breakfast was better than we expected. There were plenty of items to choose from and they were fresh and good. Overall, this stay was a complete success and we will definately use this hotel when we return next year for competition.

The staff keep this Holiday Inn clean. The rooms smelled and looked clean. The attendants kept the standard Holiday Inn Express quick start breakfast buffet well supplied with fresh food--no sunlamp sunburned cinnamon rolls or dried up hardboiled eggs at this one. Our king room included a mini kitchen with microwave, sink, refrigerator, dishes, cutlery which came in handy traveling with a baby. Everything in the mini kitchen was absolutely spotless! The bathroom was very light--not dingy like so many other hotel bathrooms and large enough to allow you to dress comfortably without banging elbows. The room was very large for a HI Express--more than enough room to keep the baby's stroller unfolded, leave suitcases out, and still have lots of room.
reviews.title: Nice, but lots of late night loiterers

description: Welcome to the Holiday Inn Express Hotel & Suites Camarillo in the heart of the Ventura County.Conveniently located off Hwy 101 halfway between Los Angeles and Santa Barbara. Our hotel is minutes from Camarillo Premium Outlets, Naval Base Ventura County, the City of Oxnard and California State University Channel Islands. Indulge in our comfortably appointed non-smoking accommodations featuring the New Stay Smart Bedding Collection, the Guest Rated # 1 shower head by Kohler and upgraded Simply Smart bathroom amenities. Our Complimentary Express Start Hot Buffet Breakfast features our signature Cinnamon Rolls and fresh fruit grown in Camarillo. Business travelers will appreciate being able to catch up on work in our business center or from your room with our wireless high-speed Internet access. Come stay with the Holiday Inn Express Hotel & Suites Camarillo, where our excellent hospitality, comfortable guest rooms and exceptional value blend perfectly for a memorable hotel experience.Businesses near hotel: Camarillo Airport, TriCal, Lockheed Martin, Seminis, Imation Corp, Semtech, Haas Automation Attractions near hotel: Camarillo Premium Outlets, Public Beaches, Camarillo Ranch House, Ronald Reagan Presidential Library.
